ids_info.name: plasma_initiation
ids_info.description: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated

plasma_initiation/global_quantities.documentation: Global quantities. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/b_fi.documentation: Stray magnetic field at plasma position. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

Data. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within b_field_stray container: Stray magnetic field at plasma position.

Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within b_field_stray container: Stray magnetic field at plasma position.

Perpendicular magnetic field at plasma position. b_field_perpendicular = sqrt(b_field_stray^2+b_field_eddy^2). Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

Data. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within b_field_perpendicular container: Perpendicular magnetic field at plasma position. b_field_perpendicular = sqrt(b_field_stray^2+b_field_eddy^2).

Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within b_field_perpendicular container: Perpendicular magnetic field at plasma position. b_field_perpendicular = sqrt(b_field_stray^2+b_field_eddy^2).

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/conn.documentation: Average length of open magnetic field lines. In the case of fully closed field lines, connection_length = 1. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

Data. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within connection_length container: Average length of open magnetic field lines. In the case of fully closed field lines, connection_length = 1.

Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within connection_length container: Average length of open magnetic field lines. In the case of fully closed field lines, connection_length = 1.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/coul.documentation: Coulomb logarithm. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

Data. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within coulomb_logarithm container: Coulomb logarithm.

Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within coulomb_logarithm container: Coulomb logarithm.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ip.documentation: Total plasma current (toroidal component). Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ip/d.documentation: Data. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within ip container: Total plasma current (toroidal component). Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ip/t.documentation: Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within ip container: Total plasma current (toroidal component). Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/t_e_.documentation: Volume averaged electron temperature (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS). Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

Data. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within t_e_volume_average container: Volume averaged electron temperature (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS).

Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within t_e_volume_average container: Volume averaged electron temperature (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS).

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/n_e_.documentation: Volume averaged electron density (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS). Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

Data. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within n_e_volume_average container: Volume averaged electron density (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS).

Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within n_e_volume_average container: Volume averaged electron density (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS).

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ion.documentation: Quantities related to the different ion species, in the sense of isonuclear or isomolecular sequences. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ion/.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within ion container: Quantities related to the different ion species, in the sense of isonuclear or isomolecular sequences.

Within ion container: Quantities related to the different ion species, in the sense of isonuclear or isomolecular sequences. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

Number of atoms of this element in the molecule. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within ion container: Quantities related to the different ion species, in the sense of isonuclear or isomolecular sequences. Within element container: List of elements forming the atom or molecule.

Ion charge (of the dominant ionization state; lumped ions are allowed), volume averaged over plasma radius. Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within global_quantities container: Global quantities. Within ion container: Quantities related to the different ion species, in the sense of isonuclear or isomolecular sequences. Within z_ion container: Ion charge (of the dominant ionization state; lumped ions are allowed), volume averaged over plasma radius.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines.documentation: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid_typ.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

options.name: rectangular
options.description: Cylindrical R,Z ala eqdsk (R=dim1, Z=dim2). In this case the position arrays should not be filled since they are redundant with grid/dim1 and dim2.

options.name: inverse
options.description: Rhopolar_polar 2D polar coordinates (rho=dim1, theta=dim2) with magnetic axis as centre of grid; the polar angle is theta= -atan2(z-zaxis,r-raxis).

options.name: inverse_psi_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=1) (dim2); could be non-equidistant; magnetic axis as centre of grid

options.name: inverse_psi_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=2) (dim2)

options.name: inverse_psi_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=3) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

options.name: inverse_psi_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=4) (dim2), could be non-equidistant; magnetic axis as centre of grid

options.name: inverse_psi_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=5) (dim2)

options.name: inverse_psi_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=6) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotornorm_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopol_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[psi-psi_axis] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: irregular_rz_na
options.description: Irregular grid, thus give list of vertices in dim1(1:ndim1), dim2(1:ndim1) and then all fields are on values(1:ndim1,1)

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid_typ.documentation: Short string identifier. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within grid_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within grid_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types.

Verbose description. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within grid_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid.documentation: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type). Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid/dim.documentation: First dimension values. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within grid container: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type).

Second dimension values. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within grid container: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type).

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid/vol.documentation: Elementary plasma volume of plasma enclosed in the cell formed by the nodes [dim1(i) dim2(j)], [dim1(i+1) dim2(j)], [dim1(i) dim2(j+1)] and [dim1(i+1) dim2(j+1)]. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within grid container: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type).

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/townsend.documentation: List of all R, Z positions along all field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

Major radius. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within townsend_or_closed_positions container: List of all R, Z positions along all field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines.

Height. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within townsend_or_closed_positions container: List of all R, Z positions along all field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines.

List of all R, Z grid positions (from ../grid) containing field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

Major radius. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within townsend_or_closed_grid_positions container: List of all R, Z grid positions (from ../grid) containing field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines.

Height. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within townsend_or_closed_grid_positions container: List of all R, Z grid positions (from ../grid) containing field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/starting.documentation: Starting position to initiate field line tracing, for each field line. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

Major radius. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within starting_positions container: Starting position to initiate field line tracing, for each field line.

Height. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices. Within starting_positions container: Starting position to initiate field line tracing, for each field line.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/e_field_.documentation: Townsend electric field along each field line. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

Parallel electric field along each field line. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/lengths.documentation: Length of each field line. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/pressure.documentation: Prefill gas pressure used in Townsend E field calculation. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/open_fra.documentation: Fraction of open field lines : ratio open fields lines / (open+closed field lines). Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/time.documentation: Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within b_field_lines container: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d.documentation: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated.

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid_type.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices.

options.name: inverse_psi_polar
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=3) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

options.name: inverse_psi_straight_field_line_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the straight-field line poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=4) (dim2), could be non-equidistant; magnetic axis as centre of grid

options.name: inverse_psi_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=5) (dim2)

options.name: inverse_psi_polar_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with psi as radial label (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (mod(index,10)=6) (dim2); could be non-equidistant

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhopolnorm_equal_arc_fourier
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[(psi-psi_axis)/(psi_edge-psi_axis)] (dim1) and Fourier modes in the polar poloidal angle (dim2)

options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/Phi_edge] (dim1) and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: inverse_rhotor_straight_field_line
options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the straight-field line poloidal angle (dim2)

options.description: Flux surface type with radial label sqrt[Phi/pi/B0] (dim1), Phi being toroidal flux, and the equal arc poloidal angle (dim2)

options.name: irregular_rz_na
options.description: Irregular grid, thus give list of vertices in dim1(1:ndim1), dim2(1:ndim1) and then all fields are on values(1:ndim1,1)

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid_type/.documentation: Short string identifier. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices. Within grid_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types.

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices. Within grid_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types.

Verbose description. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices. Within grid_type container: Selection of one of a set of grid types.

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid.documentation: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type). Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid/dim1.documentation: First dimension values. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices. Within grid container: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type).

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid/dim2.documentation: Second dimension values. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices. Within grid container: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type).

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid/volum.documentation: Elementary plasma volume of plasma enclosed in the cell formed by the nodes [dim1(i) dim2(j)], [dim1(i+1) dim2(j)], [dim1(i) dim2(j+1)] and [dim1(i+1) dim2(j+1)]. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices. Within grid container: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type).

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/e_field_ph.documentation: Toroidal component of the electric field. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/time.documentation: Time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated. Within profiles_2d container: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices.

plasma_initiation/time.documentation: Generic time. Within plasma_initiation IDS: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated.
